content: the kiskeya tank is named after the title given to the island of haïti by the taínos people meaning mother of all lands this top will be a stand-out in your wardrobe with its beautiful flowing leaf pattern and flattering shape this pattern is worked flat and the leaf pattern is created through a 6-row repetition all sizes start by creating two body panels and then to achieve size differences some will work a panel of single_crochet to join the front and back panel together
